document.docAuthor: A. D., Tran & Polhemus, D. A.
document.masterDocTitle: The genus Metrocoris Mayr, 1865 (Gerromorpha: Gerridae) in Vietnam, with descriptions of five new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Metrocoris Mayr, 1865 (Gerromorpha: Gerridae) in Vietnam, with descriptions of five new species

bibRefCitation.author: Chen PP & Nieser N
bibRefCitation.refString: Chen PP & Nieser N (1993) A taxonomic revision of the Oriental water strider genus Metrocoris Mayr (Hemiptera, Gerridae). Part I and Part II. Steenstrupia, 19 (1 - 2): 1 - 43, 45 - 82.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Metrocoris nigrofascioides Chen & Nieser, 1993: 34–35
, Figs. 90 , 97 , 105 ( type locality: Fang, Chiang Mai , Thailand );
Zettel & Chen, 1996: 152
, 177 (records from Vietnam ).

subSubSection.paragraph:

Size: apterous males: length 4.31–4.95, width 2.11–2.51; apterous females: length 4.02–4.75, width 2.23–2.52.

Remarks. See Remarks for
M. acutus
.

Distribution. Vietnam : Thanh Hoa ,
Quang Binh
, Da Nang , Kon Tum , Gia Lai , Binh Dinh , Phu Yen , Lam Dong , Dong Nai , Phu Quoc ( Fig. 139 ). Extralimital records: Myanmar : Hpungan Sadon, Thailand (northern), Laos (first record), Cambodia (first record).
